testcase.name: Add all products to cart and checkout - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in with valid 'standard_user' and 'secret_sauce'..........passed When I add all products to the cart.........................................passed Then I can see in cart badge same value as quantity of products listed on home-page.passed And I click on cart button..................................................passed Then I am redirected to cart-page...........................................passed And I can see all products from home-page listed in the cart................passed And I proceed to checkout and fill personal information: 'd', 'd', 'd'......passed And I click on continue button..............................................passed Then I am redirected to checkout overview page..............................passed And I verify the prices.....................................................passed And I click on finish button................................................passed Then I am redirected to checkout complete page..............................passed And I click on back to home page............................................passed Then cart is empty..........................................................passed
